warmup.name: Head Tilt
warmup.description: Gently tilt your head to one side, stretching the neck muscles.

warmup.name: Shoulders
warmup.description: Rotate your shoulders in a circular motion to warm up the shoulder muscles.

warmup.name: Triceps
warmup.description: Stretch your triceps by reaching one arm overhead and bending the elbow.

warmup.name: Biceps
warmup.description: Stretch your biceps by extending one arm forward and pulling your fingers back.

warmup.name: Forward, Backwards, and Upwards Lunges
warmup.description: Perform forward, backward, and upward lunges to warm up the legs.

warmup.name: Back Cross Hand Touch
warmup.description: Stand with your feet apart and touch your opposite hand to your opposite foot behind your back.

warmup.name: Back Arch
warmup.description: Arch your back backward while standing to stretch the back muscles.

warmup.name: Quadriceps
warmup.description: Stretch your quadriceps by bending one leg and pulling your heel toward your buttocks.

warmup.name: Cross Leg Hamstring
warmup.description: Sit with your legs crossed and reach forward to stretch your hamstrings.

warmup.name: Normal Hamstring
warmup.description: Sit with your legs extended forward and reach for your toes to stretch your hamstrings.

warmup.name: Full Squat
warmup.description: Perform a full squat by bending your knees and hips to lower your body.

warmup.name: Touch Floor
warmup.description: Stand with your feet apart and reach down to touch the floor.

warmup.name: Hold Ankles
warmup.description: Sit with your legs extended forward and reach down to hold your ankles.

warmup.name: Windmill
warmup.description: Stand with your arms extended to the sides and twist your upper body to touch your opposite foot.

warmup.name: Lunges Stretch
warmup.description: Perform lunges to stretch the legs and hip flexors.

warmup.name: Frequency
warmup.description: Warm up by moving your arms and legs quickly.

warmup.name: Butterfly
warmup.description: Sit with your feet together, holding your feet with your hands, and gently press your knees toward the floor.

warmup.name: Straight Leg (Arms Stretch Upwards and Also Hold Ankle)
warmup.description: Extend your legs forward, stretch your arms upward, and hold your ankles.

warmup.name: Figure 7 Hurdle Stretch
warmup.description: Create a figure-7 shape with your legs to stretch the hip and glute muscles.

warmup.name: Glutes
warmup.description: Stretch your glutes by crossing one leg over the other and pulling your knee toward your chest.

warmup.name: Ankle Knee Alignment
warmup.description: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and align your ankles and knees.

warmup.name: V-Shape Calf Stretch
warmup.description: Create a V-shape with your legs to stretch the calf muscles.

warmup.name: Cobra
warmup.description: Lie face down, place your hands under your shoulders, and arch your upper body upward.

warmup.name: Parachute
warmup.description: Stand with your arms outstretched to the sides and swing them in a circular motion.

mobility.name: Head Rotation
mobility.description: Rotate your head in a circular motion to improve neck flexibility.

mobility.name: Shoulder Rotation
mobility.description: Rotate your shoulders in a circular motion to improve shoulder mobility.

mobility.name: Arm Swing
mobility.description: Swing your arms forward and backward to warm up and stretch the shoulder muscles.

flexibility.name: Butterfly
flexibility.description: Sit with your feet together, holding your feet with your hands, and gently press your knees toward the floor.

flexibility.name: Seated Forward Bend
flexibility.description: Sit with your legs extended forward and bend at your hips to reach for your toes.

flexibility.name: Head Rotation
flexibility.description: Rotate your head in a circular motion to improve neck flexibility.

flexibility.name: Shoulder Rotation
flexibility.description: Rotate your shoulders in a circular motion to improve shoulder mobility.

flexibility.name: Arm Swing
flexibility.description: Swing your arms forward and backward to warm up and stretch the shoulder muscles.

flexibility.name: Butterfly
flexibility.description: Sit with your feet together, holding your feet with your hands, and gently press your knees toward the floor.

flexibility.name: Seated Forward Bend
flexibility.description: Sit with your legs extended forward and bend at your hips to reach for your toes.

flexibility.name: Hug Knees
flexibility.description: Sit with your legs bent and hug your knees to your chest, rounding your back.

flexibility.name: Flexibility and Mobility of Arm
flexibility.description: Rotate your arms in circular motions to enhance arm flexibility and mobility.

flexibility.name: Arm Swings
flexibility.description: Swing your arms forward and backward to warm up and stretch the shoulder muscles.

flexibility.name: Forward Lunges
flexibility.description: Perform forward lunges, stepping forward with one leg and bending the knee.

flexibility.name: Lean Back on Back Leg After Lunges
flexibility.description: Lean back on the back leg after performing lunges to stretch the hip flexors.

flexibility.name: Flexibility of Legs, Primarily Also Mobility
flexibility.description: Enhance the flexibility of your legs, with a focus on hip mobility.

other.name: Vertical Jump
other.description: Jump as high as you can while pushing off the ground with both feet.

other.name: Straight Leg Run
other.description: Run with your legs straight, focusing on quick, short steps.

other.name: High Knees
other.description: Run in place while lifting your knees as high as possible with each step.

other.name: Butt Kicks
other.description: Jog in place and kick your buttocks with your heels during each stride.

other.name: Race Walk
other.description: Walk briskly with a straight knee, keeping one foot on the ground at all times.

other.name: Neck Flexion
other.description: Gently lower your chin towards your chest to stretch the neck muscles.

other.name: Lateral Neck Flexion
other.description: Tilt your head to one side to stretch the neck muscles on that side.

other.name: Cross-body Shoulder Stretch
other.description: Pull one arm across your chest to stretch the shoulder muscles.

other.name: Overhead Triceps and Shoulder Stretch
other.description: Extend one arm overhead and bend the elbow to stretch the triceps and shoulders.

other.name: Wrist Extension Stretch
other.description: Extend your wrist and fingers backward to stretch the wrist extensors.

other.name: Wrist Flexion Stretch
other.description: Flex your wrist and fingers forward to stretch the wrist flexors.
